system.description:
Advanced launcher using sophisticated rocket-assisted grenades (not interchangeable with those of the older grenade launcher). Provides better range and magazine capacity than a standard grenade launcher. If loading HEAP grenades, each 10-shot magazine’s cost becomes Cr1300 instead.

Auto 3: These weapons fire multiple rounds with every pull of the trigger, filling the air with a hail of fire. A weapon with the Auto aspect can make attacks in three fire modes: single, burst, and full auto, as described in the Combat chapter.

Bulky: A weapon that has powerful recoil or is simply extremely heavy—this makes it difficult to use effectively in combat by someone of a weak physical stature. Characters with STR 8 or less get a -2 penalty when using such weapons.
system.shortdescr: Advanced grenade launcher utilizing sophisticated rocket-assisted grenades
